data.message: I was reading about Jimmy Fallon and Madonna donating and so I thought I'd come here and see what you were doing. Every time I hear "Detroit" I think about you in "Forgot About Dre" talking to the news reporter "Detroit! Detroit Baby! What!". I'm in the UP so I know they're like, 70 miles apart or whatever, but It's great to see native Michiganders coming together to help out a town I'm sure many government officials thought people would ignore because of the socio-economic make up of the area. Anyway, hi five man.
